section.name: New Releases
section.p: January 27, 2016. OpenDJ 3.0.0 is available. OpenDJ is a major release of ForgeRock's directory services software. For details, see the Release Notes. You can download OpenDJ software from the ForgeRock BackStage download page.

section.name: Previous Releases
section.p: July 04, 2013. OpenDJ 2.6.0 is now available! OpenDJ 2.6.0 is an important release of ForgeRock's directory services product, with many key fixes and new features. See the Release Notes for more. You can get the binaries from the ForgeRock OpenDJ download page.

July 26, 2012. OpenDJ 2.4.6 has been released! OpenDJ 2.4.6 is an update release of the OpenDJ project. You can get the release from the download page. See the Release Notes for additional information.

July 23, 2012. OpenDJ 2.5.0 Xpress is out now! OpenDJ 2.5.0 Xpress brings you the latest OpenDJ directory server and DSML gateway features, including the capability to delegate authentication to Microsoft AD, improved referential integrity for groups, access log filtering and formatting, optimistic concurrency control using ETags, synchronization of Samba and OpenDJ passwords, 30 additional new features and enhancements, and 150 bug fixes. Get OpenDJ 2.5.0 Xpress from the ForgeRock download page. Be sure to read the Release Notes for additional information.

February 27, 2012. OpenDJ 2.4.5 is now available. OpenDJ 2.4.5 is an update release of the OpenDJ project. You can get the release from the download page. See the Release Notes for additional information. Note that you must rebuild the ds-sync-hist index after upgrade, but before restarting OpenDJ.

October 14, 2011. OpenDJ 2.4.4 has been released. OpenDJ 2.4.4 is an update release of the OpenDJ project. You can get the release from the download page. See the Release Notes for the lists of fixes and known issues.

June 17, 2011. We released OpenDJ 2.4.3 today! OpenDJ 2.4.3 is an update release of the OpenDJ project and resolves several issues found around the External Change Log and the bundled database version. Visit the archive page for the Java WebStart and .zip versions, SVR4 packages for Solaris, and the DSML gateway. Release Notes are on the Wiki.
April 24, 2011. OpenDJ 2.4.2 is out! Come get 2.4.2 from the download page.
March 2, 2011. OpenDJ 2.4.1 now available! Get it from the download page.
